Contents: {RPMI-1640: {2 mM L-glutamine, 10 mM HEPES, 1 mM sodium pyruvate, 4500 mg/L glucose, 1500 mg/L sodium bicarbonate}}
Additional_Info: All  S.  aureus  strains  were  grown  in  tryptic  soy  broth  (TSB, 309 Sigma-Aldrich) or RPMI-1640 (Gibco) with 10% Lysogeny broth (LB, Sigma-Aldrich, MO) 310 containing 10 g/L peptone, 5 g/L yeast extract, 10 g/L NaCl with the appropriate antibiotics 311 for plasmid maintenance or selection (ampicillin, 100 ug/mL; chloramphenicol, 10 ug/mL) 312 with shaking (250 rpm) at 37°C, maintaining a flask-to-medium volume ratio of 9:1, unless 313 otherwise specified
